code: import React from"react";import{DesktopComputerIcon,AcademicCapIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import{certifications}from"../data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Certifications(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"certifications",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AcademicCapIcon,{className:"w-10 inline-block mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font text-white mb-12",children:"Certifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap m-4",children:certifications.map(function(certification){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 md:w-1/2 w-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-full bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-40 p-8 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DesktopComputerIcon,{className:"block w-8 text-gray-500 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"leading-relaxed mb-6",children:certification.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inline-flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"testimonial",src:certification.image,className:"w-12 rounded-full flex-shrink-0 object-cover object-center"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"flex-grow flex flex-col pl-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-font font-medium text-white",children:certification.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500 text-sm uppercase",children:certification.url})]})]})]})},certification.name);})})]})});}
